text.name: info1
text.text: The Vectrex is a vector display-based home video game console that was developed by Western Technologies/Smith Engineering. It was licensed and distributed first by General Consumer Electronics (GCE).

text.name: info1
text.text: O Vectrex, que usava o processador Motorola MC68A09, era o único videogame que apresentava gráficos vetoriais em seu monitor pré-integrado ao console, ao qual era possível conectar até dois controladores.

text.name: info1
text.text: The Vectrex is a vector display-based home video game console that was developed by Western Technologies/Smith Engineering. It was licensed and distributed first by General Consumer Electronics (GCE).

text.name: info1
text.text: Es una consola con pantalla integrada, blanco y negro. Una de sus innovaciones, además de tener la pantalla incluida, son los gráficos basados en vectores, en vez de los indefinidos gráficos a pixeles.

text.name: info1
text.text: Vectrex est une console de jeux vidéo 8 bits développée par Smith Engineering et distribuée par General Consumer Electric, et plus tard par MB (Milton Bradley Company) après le rachat de GCE.

text.name: info1
text.text: Vectrex ist eine vektorbasierte Heimvideospielkonsole, die von Western Technologies/Smith Engineering entwickelt wurde. Es wurde zuerst von General Consumer Electronics (GCE) lizenziert und vertrieben.
